workouts.title: olympic style weight lifting
workouts.description: a progression of exercises to get you to the level of an olympic weight lifter

exercises.title: clean and jerk
exercises.description: a two-movement weightlifting exercise in which a weight is raised above the head following an initial lift to shoulder level.

exercises.title: romanian deadlift
exercises.description: The deadlift is a weight training exercise in which a loaded barbell is lifted off the ground to the hips, then lowered back to the ground.

exercises.title: overhead squat
exercises.description: the barbell is held overhead in a wide-arm snatch grip; however, it is also possible to use a closer grip if balance allows.

exercises.title: overhead press
exercises.description: typically performed while standing, in which a weight is pressed straight upwards from the shoulders until the arms are locked out overhead.

exercises.title: biceps curl
exercises.description: Although the exercises differ, a common factor of each is a 'curling' motion, where a weight (attached to, or used in conjunction with, an item of equipment listed above) is moved through an arc, primarily using the strength

exercises.title: chest fly/flye
exercises.description: A fly or flye is a strength training exercise in which the hand and arm move through an arc while the elbow is kept at a constant angle.

workouts.title: dumbbell workout
workouts.description: a high intensity chest and arms workout with dumbbells
